Articles.Content:
Living in a redneck family I have grown to appreciate racing of all sorts. and because of this I spend a lot of time creating racer-ish rovers in KSP. but I want to issue a challenge to you guys to design either a NASCAR race car, a dragster, a formula racer, or a drifter.

**General Rules**

-completely stock, no mods allowed

-only dragsters or formula cars can use rockets, jet engines, or srbs. Although non-functioning ones are allowed on all car types for design purposes.

-infinifuel is allowed

-you need to upload a screenshot, gallery, or video of your vehicle to this thread.

-part clipping is restricted to non debug menu (placement tricks are more than allowed)

-for judgment purposes, a download link will need to be posted so I can test the vessel for handling

-part count=unlimited

-when judging for design, be fair and honest.

-HAVE FUN!

**Judging**

-Design: X/10 will be judged by the viewers of this thread exempt of the creator of this vessel

-Speed: X/10 participants will list top speed in their post and will be confirmed by myself during handling testing

-Handling X/10 I will personally test the handling

**-Each division will be separately judged, and have their own top five.-**
